host.description: The Jira host to query from

user.description: The email of the user to connect to Jira with

token_file.description: The path to the file containing the Jira API token

database.description: The path to the SQLite database to containing workflow information

job_directory.description: The directory to save jobs to. Defaults to current working directory.

projects.description: Information required to start workflows from a Jira project

new_status.description: The status that indicates an issue is new

workflow_command.description: The command to run to start a workflow. The command should take the issues as its only command line argument

publish_command.description: The command to run to publish the results of a workflow. The command should take the job working directory as its only command line argument
